info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 16 at 11:36PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH WILL EXPIRE AT MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... The Flash Flood Watch will expire for portions of central Colorado and southeast Colorado, including the central mountains, the La Garita mountains, the southern mountains, and parts of the plains generally along the Colorado and New Mexico border. Light to moderate rain will continue over the plains generally along the Colorado and New Mexico border into the early morning hours. Some areas in Baca county received 2 to 3 inches of rain, and ponding of water has likely occurred over this region, especially over rural county roadways. However, the probability of additional heavy rain is low, and for this reason,the Flash Flood Watch will expire at Midnight MDT tonight.
